helpembed.helptext:
Hi! I'm NerdBot, a nerdy multi-purpose bot. Below is a list of my commands.
Do `{0}help commandname` for more info about a command.

facts: Matea loves Morgan more than anything in the whole world <3
Morgan is the most perfect guy ever to exist <3
Matea wants to be with Morgan forever <3
Matea is the luckiest girl in the world <3
Morgan makes Matea so incredibly happy <3
Morgan is so special to Matea <3

help.colour_from_img:
Get the average or a random colour from the attached image. Run the command and attach an image in the same message.
Example: `{0}colour_from_img -r`
help.palette: Generates a colour palette from the attached image. Run the command and attach an image in the same message.
help.html_to_img:
Renders html and returns it as a png! Example: `{0}html_to_img

Hello world
help.say:
I can pass on any message for you.
Example: `{0}say shut up`
help.embed:
I can embed a message to make it look fancy. Title and colours have to be specified after the text.
Example: `{0}embed uhhhh -t Breaking news -c 00000000`
help.bestperson: Who's the best person in the world, you ask?
help.plot:
Plots a mathematical expression using matplotlib. 
Plot static functions with *x*, surfaces with *x* and *y*, and polar functions with *theta*. Use *a* to animate your function.
Example: `{0}plot x^2+y -range x=[-5, 5] y=[-2.5, 2.5]`
help.calculate:
I'm quite the calculator myself.
Example: `{0}calculate 69^69`
help.play:
Plays a youtube video in voice chat from either a youtube link or a search query. 
Example: `{0}play whitechapel`
help.pause: Pauses currently playing song in voice chat.
help.resume: Resumes currently paused song in voice chat.
help.skip: Skips currently playing song in voice chat.
help.search:
Displays a list of youtube results from your query.
Example: `{0}search whitechapel`

plot.range: Defaults to [-10,10] for cartesian, [0, 2*pi] for polar. Specify a range for your variables. Format: variable=[min, max]
plot.rt: Defaults to false. Sets a surface plot to rotate.

embed.t: Defaults to none. Set a title for your embed.
embed.c: Defaults to black. Set a colour for your embed. Supports hexadecimal and integer colour values.
embed.a: Removes author tag and makes the embed author anonymous.

colour_from_img.m: Calculates the mean value of the image
colour_from_img.r: Gets a the random colour from an image

play.list: Displays a list of results from your query.
